Info.Info1: Up to 3000 records can be imported at once.
Info.Info2: Maximum allowed file size is 2 megabytes.
Info.Info4: The first line in Excel file should contain field headers. Mapping will be done accordingly. The records should start from the second line.
Info.Info5: Picklist fields value must be already on the system.
Info.Info6: Checkbox fields value must be Yes/No or true/false.
Info.Info7: User fields value must be user's full name or email.
Info.Info8: Multiselect and tag fields values are seperated by "|" sign. For example: Red | Green | Blue
